name: Polypus
description:
A little Unity project made in about a month as a training to lean unity.
I think it's enjoyable enough to share it.
the web version should work, but for some reason it doesn't, so try the windows builds, it always work, even on linux (i made a linux build though, just in case)

CONTROLS
  • USE A GAMEPAD WITH A JOYSTICK!
  • use your joystick to move around, be careful, the momentum is easy to understand but hard to master
  • you can also spit ink with your right trigger, but it's useless.
CREDITS
  • thanks to matt production for the intro music (https://soundcloud.com/supermattboy)
  • thanks to sapht for the main music (https://soundcloud.com/sapht)
  • thanks to NotWoods for the very useful polygon mesh2D script i used to shape the rocks and the level (https://github.com/NotWoods/unity-polygon-2d-editor)
  • thanks to my family for giving me the time to do this little project
  • thanks to you for trying my game

(note that the font was made by me using birdfont, this is why it's so poorly made, but i didn't found a proper polygonal font that had the look i wanted.)
